name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction.

name: Dark Magician
description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

name: Dragon Treasure
description: A magic card that grants power to all Dragon-type monsters.

name: Mirror Force
description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon
description: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

name: Legendary Fisherman
description: While 'Umi' is on the field, this card is unaffected by Spell Cards.

name: Magician's Circle
description: Increases all Spellcaster-type monsters' attack points by 300.

name: Trap Hole
description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

name: Summoned Skull
description: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

name: Exodia the Forbidden One
description: If you have all five pieces of Exodia the Forbidden One in your hand, you win the Duel.

name: Monster Reborn
description: Target 1 monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon it.

name: Swords of Revealing Light
description: Flip all monsters your opponent controls face-up. This card remains on the field for 3 of your opponent's turns. No monsters can attack.

name: Change of Heart
description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

name: Raigeki
description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

name: Mystical Elf
description: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.
